mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM grade A INNER JOIN joinclass B ON A.join_class_id = B.join_class_id WHERE B.join_class_id = #{joinClassId} AND A.subject_id = #{subjectId}

SELECT A.subject_name, B.exam_date, CASE WHEN A.SCORE_TYPE = 0 THEN B.score ELSE NULL END AS result_score, CASE WHEN A.SCORE_TYPE != 0 THEN CASE WHEN COALESCE(B.PASS, 0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END ELSE NULL END AS result_pass FROM subject A INNER JOIN grade B ON A.subject_id = B.subject_id INNER JOIN joinclass C ON B.join_class_id = C.join_class_id WHERE C.join_class_id = #{joinClassId} LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{size}

SELECT A.aca_pic, C.subject_id, C.subject_name, D.exam_date, D.processing_status FROM academy A INNER JOIN class B ON A.aca_id = B.aca_id INNER JOIN subject C ON B.class_id = C.class_id INNER JOIN grade D ON C.subject_id = D.subject_id WHERE A.aca_id = #{acaId} AND B.class_id = #{classId} GROUP BY subject_id LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{size}

SELECT E.user_id, E.user_pic, E.name, C.join_class_id, D.grade_id, F.subject_name, D.exam_date, CASE WHEN F.SCORE_TYPE = 0 THEN D.score ELSE 0 END AS score, CASE WHEN F.SCORE_TYPE != 0 THEN CASE WHEN COALESCE(D.PASS, 0) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE 1 END ELSE NULL END AS pass FROM academy A INNER JOIN class B ON A.aca_id = B.aca_id INNER JOIN joinclass C ON B.class_id = C.class_id INNER JOIN `user` E ON E.user_id = C.user_id INNER JOIN `subject` F ON B.class_id = F.class_id LEFT JOIN grade D ON C.join_class_id = D.join_class_id AND F.subject_id = D.subject_id WHERE F.subject_id = #{subjectId} LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{size}
